name: Food Ninja (itch)
description:
To test your clicking skill. I have created a game called Food Ninja.

Game Rules:

Click on the food item to get points and avoid the baddies (Skull and bomb) to get an negative points.

There are different levels depending on how confident you feel on the day.

Hope you guys enjoy it. 

P.S. I will be bringing in more updates to the game.

Please leave your feedback / suggestions. Without it no game is successful.
